00038 void
00039 LocationCache::insert(uint32_t table_id, RangeLocationInfo &range_loc_info,
00040                       bool pegged) {
00041   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00042   Value *newval = new Value;
00043   LocationMap::iterator iter;
00044   LocationCacheKey key;
00045 
00046   /*
00047   HT_DEBUG_OUT << table_id << " start=" << start_row << " end=" << end_row
00048       << " location=" << location << HT_END;
00049   */
00050 
00051   newval->start_row = range_loc_info.start_row;
00052   newval->end_row = range_loc_info.end_row;
00053   newval->location = get_constant_location_str(range_loc_info.location.c_str());
00054   newval->pegged = pegged;
00055 
00056   key.table_id = table_id;
00057   key.end_row = (range_loc_info.end_row == "") ? 0 : newval->end_row.c_str();
00058 
00059   // remove old entry
00060   if ((iter = m_location_map.find(key)) != m_location_map.end())
00061     remove((*iter).second);
00062 
00063   // make room for the new entry
00064   while (m_location_map.size() >= m_max_entries) {
00065     if (m_tail->pegged)
00066       move_to_head(m_tail);
00067     else
00068       remove(m_tail);
00069   }
00070 
00071   // add to head
00072   if (m_head == 0) {
00073     assert(m_tail == 0);
00074     newval->next = newval->prev = 0;
00075     m_head = m_tail = newval;
00076   }
00077   else {
00078     m_head->next = newval;
00079     newval->prev = m_head;
00080     newval->next = 0;
00081     m_head = newval;
00082   }
00083 
00084   // Insert the new entry into the map, recording an iterator to the entry
00085   {
00086     std::pair<LocationMap::iterator, bool> old_entry;
00087     LocationMap::value_type map_value(key, newval);
00088     old_entry = m_location_map.insert(map_value);
00089     assert(old_entry.second);
00090     newval->map_iter = old_entry.first;
00091   }
00092 
00093 }
00094 
00098 LocationCache::~LocationCache() {
00099   for (LocationStrSet::iterator iter = m_location_strings.begin();
00100       iter != m_location_strings.end(); ++iter)
00101     delete [] *iter;
00102   for (LocationMap::iterator lm_it = m_location_map.begin();
00103       lm_it != m_location_map.end(); ++lm_it)
00104     delete (*lm_it).second;
00105 }

00111 bool
00112 LocationCache::lookup(uint32_t table_id, const char *rowkey,
00113                       RangeLocationInfo *rane_loc_infop, bool inclusive) {
00114   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00115   LocationMap::iterator iter;
00116   LocationCacheKey key;
00117 
00118   //cout << table_id << " row=" << rowkey << endl << flush;
00119 
00120   key.table_id = table_id;
00121   key.end_row = rowkey;
00122 
00123   if ((iter = m_location_map.lower_bound(key)) == m_location_map.end())
00124     return false;
00125 
00126   if ((*iter).first.table_id != table_id)
00127     return false;
00128 
00129   if (inclusive) {
00130     if (strcmp(rowkey, (*iter).second->start_row.c_str()) < 0)
00131       return false;
00132   }
00133   else {
00134     if (strcmp(rowkey, (*iter).second->start_row.c_str()) <= 0)
00135       return false;
00136   }
00137 
00138   move_to_head((*iter).second);
00139 
00140   rane_loc_infop->start_row = (*iter).second->start_row;
00141   rane_loc_infop->end_row   = (*iter).second->end_row;
00142   rane_loc_infop->location  = (*iter).second->location;
00143 
00144   return true;
00145 }
00146 
00147 bool LocationCache::invalidate(uint32_t table_id, const char *rowkey) {
00148   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00149   LocationMap::iterator iter;
00150   LocationCacheKey key;
00151 
00152   //cout << table_id << " row=" << rowkey << endl << flush;
00153 
00154   key.table_id = table_id;
00155   key.end_row = rowkey;
00156 
00157   if ((iter = m_location_map.lower_bound(key)) == m_location_map.end())
00158     return false;
00159 
00160   if ((*iter).first.table_id != table_id)
00161     return false;
00162 
00163   if (strcmp(rowkey, (*iter).second->start_row.c_str()) < 0)
00164     return false;
00165 
00166   remove((*iter).second);
00167   return true;
00168 }

00171 void LocationCache::display(std::ostream &out) {
00172   for (Value *value = m_head; value; value = value->prev)
00173     out << "DUMP: end=" << value->end_row << " start=" << value->start_row
00174         << endl;
00175 }

00181 void LocationCache::move_to_head(Value *cacheval) {
00182 
00183   if (m_head == cacheval)
00184     return;
00185 
00186   // unstich entry from cache
00187   cacheval->next->prev = cacheval->prev;
00188   if (cacheval->prev == 0)
00189     m_tail = cacheval->next;
00190   else
00191     cacheval->prev->next = cacheval->next;
00192 
00193   cacheval->next = 0;
00194   cacheval->prev = m_head;
00195   m_head->next = cacheval;
00196   m_head = cacheval;
00197 }
00198 
00199 
00203 void LocationCache::remove(Value *cacheval) {
00204   assert(cacheval);
00205   if (m_tail == cacheval) {
00206     m_tail = cacheval->next;
00207     if (m_tail)
00208       m_tail->prev = 0;
00209     else {
00210       assert (m_head == cacheval);
00211       m_head = 0;
00212     }
00213   }
00214   else if (m_head == cacheval) {
00215     m_head = m_head->prev;
00216     m_head->next = 0;
00217   }
00218   else {
00219     cacheval->next->prev = cacheval->prev;
00220     cacheval->prev->next = cacheval->next;
00221   }
00222   m_location_map.erase(cacheval->map_iter);
00223   delete cacheval;
00224 }

00226 
00227 const char *LocationCache::get_constant_location_str(const char *location) {
00228   LocationStrSet::iterator iter = m_location_strings.find(location);
00229 
00230   if (iter != m_location_strings.end())
00231     return *iter;
00232 
00233   char *locstr = new char [strlen(location) + 1];
00234   strcpy(locstr, location);
00235   m_location_strings.insert(locstr);
00236   return locstr;
00237 }

00243 bool
00244 LocationCache::location_to_addr(const char *location,
00245                                 struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00246   const char *ptr = location + strlen(location);
00247   String host;
00248   uint16_t port;
00249 
00250   for (--ptr; ptr >= location; --ptr) {
00251     if (*ptr == '_')
00252       break;
00253   }
00254 
00255   port = (uint16_t)strtol(ptr+1, 0, 10);
00256 
00257   host = String(location, ptr-location);
00258 
00259   return InetAddr::initialize(&addr, host.c_str(), port);
00260 }
